original_text: And Asa in the thirty and ninth year of his reign was diseased in his feet, until his disease was exceeding great: yet in his disease he sought not to the Lord, but to the physicians.
korean_text: 아사가 왕이 된 지 삼십구 년에 그의 발이 병들어 매우 위독했으나 병이 있을 때에 그가 여호와께 구하지 아니하고 의원들에게 구하였더라

sentences.original_text: And Asa in the thirty and ninth year of his reign
until his disease was exceeding great
yet in his disease he sought not to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 병 중에 그는 여호와께 구하지 아니하고
